I’m honoured to represent Chelsea and Fulham as a Member of Parliament and to stand up for all my constituents.
You can use my website to find my latest contributions in Parliament or read my blog to learn more about the issues I am campaigning on.
I send out a regular newsletter and you can sign up to receive this here.
You can also follow me on social media using the buttons at the bottom of this webpage.
If you’d like my help or want to raise something with me, please email me at ben.coleman.mp@parliament.uk and I’ll get back to you as soon as I can.

We’ve saved the King’s Road Post Office!
I’m delighted that services will continue under a new franchise model. My thanks to all those who campaigned with me.

As the first-ever Labour Member of Parliament for Chelsea and Fulham, I’m honoured and hugely grateful to all those voters who put their trust in me.
From my heart, thank you. Thank you to everyone who voted for me and who has sent me kind words in the three weeks since I was elected as your MP for Chelsea and Fulham.
